title: Pagetype explanationPic content
description: Description of the content of the Pagetype 'explanationPic'

text.description: The text shown on the Page. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

img.description: Filename of the image. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

imagePosition.description: Sets the position of the image on the Page. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

continueDelay.description: The amount of seconds after which the Continue Button is shown. -1 for never(wait for Hardware). OR {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties. Can also be accessed by hardware, via the 'showContinueButton' event
